title: From Podcast To Broadcast: 'Men In Blazers' Gets The ESPN Bump
teaser: The soccer podcast Men In Blazers started out as a modest Grantland podcast, then blew up when ESPN included them during World Cup coverage. As hosts Michael Davies and Roger Bennett tell NPR's Arun Rath, they'll soon have their own show on NBC Sports.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
